title: Homepage
text:
# Hi,
I'm **Ordo**, a free, open source note-taking app that uses Markdown to store your thoughts.
### This page is editable with Markdown by the way.
Feel free to
- erase this text
- write something of your own
- take a screenshot
- share it on the web showing what those devs did here

We don't mind, really. In fact, we're not even sure if it actually works. ðŸŽ‰
## What's Next?
1. There's an *Activity Bar* at the bottom (the thing with icons). Check it out

2. The icon in the top right (**`ctrl+shift+p`**) brings you to the command palette. That's a cool one
